# UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.whenEditing

**Case**

The accessory displays only when the cell is in editing mode.

## Declaration

```swift
case whenEditing
```

## States

- **UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.always**: The accessory always displays.
- **UICellAccessory.DisplayedState.whenNotEditing**: The accessory displays only when the cell isn’t in editing mode.

items.description: The accessory displays only when the cell isn’t in editing mode.
